    About Me

    I am a first-year graduate student (PhD Program) advised by Dr. David Doermann, in Department of Computer Science and Engineering, State University of New York at Buffalo.

    Before that, I recieved B.Eng from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC).

    Interests
